name: Baba-Liba
overview: Johny Jones, hero of the SAIMAZOON, is in the Palace of Hosmimumarack. As every good adventurer must fulfill the mission entrusted: 1) Take over the TREASURE, fruit of multiple looting. 2) Abduct the PRINCESS, daughter of the Sultan. 3) Rescue your partner, made a PRISONER in the BABALAS wars. J.J. has the help of 20 PUMPS and 2 keys. Once you have achieved your purpose you should gather orderly the letters that form the BABALIBA SPELL, with which you will be able to leave the Palace.
